text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Effective date" means the date that an eligible governmental unit commenced or commences participation in an employees' system.
"Eligible governmental unit" means a governmental unit that is eligible to participate in the employees' systems under § 31-102 of this subtitle.

section.section: "Employee" means a regular employee of an eligible governmental unit.
"Employee" includes an officer of an eligible governmental unit.
"Employee" does not include a contractual, emergency, or temporary extra employee.

text.section: "Employees' system" means the Employees' Retirement System or the Employees' Pension System.

section.section: "Legislative body" means the entity with legislative authority or control over an eligible governmental unit.

text.section: "Local pension system" means a retirement or pension system established by the legislative body of an eligible governmental unit.
